nodes.title: 7 Personal Lessons from Founding a Startup
nodes.excerpt: When people use analogies of your co-founder being like a wife, a startup as your baby, and employees as family, it shouldn't be a surprise…
nodes.description: 7 personal lessons I learned from founding a startup at 18, developing into a young adult, interviewing at Y Combinator, and why I decided to exit.

nodes.title: 5 Tough Lessons for When Your Startup Fails
nodes.excerpt: When your world stops spinning, the lights fade, and the silence surrounds you, you can finally think. These past 13 weeks have been the…
nodes.description: At our final Laurier Launchpad update presentation we summarized the five biggest lessons we had learned founding our startup, Teknically.

nodes.title: Teknically Part 2: The Dream Fades
nodes.excerpt: Two eggs over easy, hash browns, double bacon, ham, sausage, french toast. It's hard to tell which was the final straw but by the end of…
nodes.description: To Y Combinator and back again, our biggest lessons at Teknically Inc. building Webplio: a Google Analytics dashboard that anybody could use.

nodes.title: Teknically Part 1: The 389 Day Laurier BBA
nodes.excerpt: Today I declined my co-op offer. Last week, I deferred all my classes. My time as a full time BBA student at Wilfrid Laurier University is…
nodes.description: My first year as a BBA student at Wilfrid Laurier University was unlike anything imaginable. I started a business, travelled the world, and now I'm free.
